CompletionException(java.lang.Throwable).Description: Constructs a CompletionException with the specified cause. The detail message is set to (cause == null ? null : cause.toString()) (which typically contains the class and detail message of cause).

Parameters: Throwable: the cause (which is saved for later retrieval by the @B_java#lang#Throwable#getCause_E@ method)
